data.name: Domain/Host name mappings are used internally to resolve a specific site from the database when a web request comes in for that host/domain name. data.name: Note that the request has to be coming to the web site installation for this to work. That is, you still need a DNS record for the domain or host name to resolve to the IP (Internet Protocol) address of the web site installation, and if the IP address is shared with other web site installations you also still need host name mappings in the web server bindings so that the web server maps the request to the correct web site installation.
